content: संभ्रमः {@--1@} Turning round, whirling, revolving. {@--2@} Haste, hurry. {@--3@} Confusion, agitation, flurry; <ls>Ku. 3. 48.</ls> {@--4@} Fear, alarm, fright; <ls>Ś. 1</ls>; <ls>Ki. 15. 2.</ls> {@--5@} Error, mistake, ignorance. {@--6@} Zeal, activity. {@--7@} Respect, reverence; गृहमुपगते संभ्रमविधिः <ls>Bh. 2. 64</ls>; तव वीर्यवतः कश्चिद्यद्यस्ति मयि संभ्रमः <ls>Rām.</ls> {@--8@} Uproar, tumult. {@--9@} Ignorance.
